verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about on <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G2250>days<s%> while He was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple<s%> and <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel,<s%> that the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> with the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2186>confronted<s%> [Him,]

and they <S%G3004>spoke,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to Him, <S%G3004>"Tell<s%> us by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> You are <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is the one who <S%G1325>gave<s%> You <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%>?"
And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2065>ask<s%> you a <S%G3056>question,<s%> and you <S%G3004>tell<s%> Me:
"Was the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> from <S%G444>men<s%>?"

And they <S%G4817>reasoned<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> we <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'From <S%G3772>heaven,<s%>' He will <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1223>'Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you not <S%G4100>believe<s%> him? '

"But <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'From <S%G444>men,<s%>' <S%G537>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> will <S%G2642>stone<s%> us to <S%G2642>death,<s%> for they are <S%G3982>convinced<s%> that <S%G2491>John<s%> was a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>"
And they <S%G611>answered<s%> that they did not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> [it came] from.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3761>"Neither<s%> will I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>"

And He <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3004>tell<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable:<s%> "A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5452>planted<s%> a <S%G290>vineyard<s%> and <S%G1554>rented<s%> it out to vine-growers, and <S%G589>went<s%> on a <S%G589>journey<s%> for a <S%G2425>long<s%> <S%G5550>time.<s%>

"And at the [harvest] <S%G2540>time<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> a <S%G1401>slave<s%> to the vine-growers, in <S%G2443>order<s%> that they might <S%G1325>give<s%> him [some] of the <S%G2590>produce<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard;<s%> but the vine-growers <S%G1194>beat<s%> him and <S%G1821>sent<s%> him <S%G1821>away<s%> empty-handed.

"And he <S%G4369>proceeded<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G1401>slave;<s%> and they <S%G1194>beat<s%> him <S%G2548>also<s%> and <S%G818>treated<s%> him <S%G818>shamefully,<s%> and <S%G1821>sent<s%> him <S%G1821>away<s%> empty-handed.
"And he <S%G4369>proceeded<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> a <S%G5154>third;<s%> and <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>one<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> they <S%G5135>wounded<s%> and <S%G1544>cast<s%> out.

"And the <S%G2962>owner<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>'What<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%>? I will <S%G3992>send<s%> my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>son;<s%> <S%G2481>perhaps<s%> they will <S%G1788>respect<s%> him.'

"But when the vine-growers <S%G3708>saw<s%> him, they <S%G1260>reasoned<s%> with <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>'This<s%> is the <S%G2818>heir;<s%> let us <S%G615>kill<s%> him that the <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> may be <S%G1473>ours.<s%>'

"And they <S%G1544>threw<s%> him out of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> and <S%G615>killed<s%> him. <S%G5101>What,<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> will the <S%G2962>owner<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> to them?

"He will <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> vine-growers and will <S%G1325>give<s%> the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> to <S%G243>others.<s%>" And when they <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they <S%G3004>said,<s%> "May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be!"

But He <S%G1689>looked<s%> at them and <S%G3004>said,<s%> " <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> that is <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'The <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3618>builders<s%> <S%G593>rejected,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> the <S%G2776>chief<s%> <S%G1137>corner<s%> [stone]'?

<S%G3956>"Everyone<s%> who <S%G4098>falls<s%> on that <S%G3037>stone<s%> will be <S%G4917>broken<s%> to <S%G4917>pieces;<s%> but on <S%G3739>whomever<s%> <S%G302><s%> it <S%G4098>falls,<s%> it will <S%G3039>scatter<s%> him <S%G3039>like<s%> <S%G3039>dust.<s%>"

And the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2212>tried<s%> to <S%G1911>lay<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> on Him that <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and they <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G2992>people;<s%> for they <S%G1097>understood<s%> that He <S%G3004>spoke<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> them.

And they <S%G3906>watched<s%> Him, and <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1455>spies<s%> who <S%G5271>pretended<s%> to be <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that they might <S%G1949>catch<s%> Him in some <S%G3056>statement,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> as to <S%G3860>deliver<s%> Him up to the <S%G746>rule<s%> and the <S%G1849>authority<s%> of the <S%G2232>governor.<s%>

And they <S%G1905>questioned<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> we <S%G3609>know<s%> that You <S%G3004>speak<s%> and <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G3723>correctly,<s%> and You are not <S%G2983>partial<s%> <S%G4383><s%> to any, but <S%G1321>teach<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G225>truth.<s%>
"Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for us to <S%G1325>pay<s%> <S%G5411>taxes<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> not?"
But He <S%G2657>detected<s%> their <S%G3834>trickery<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them,
" <S%G1166>Show<s%> Me a <S%G1220>denarius.<s%> <S%G5101>Whose<s%> <S%G1504>likeness<s%> and <S%G1923>inscription<s%> does it <S%G2192>have<s%>?" And they <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Caesar's."
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5106>"Then<s%> <S%G591>render<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar<s%> the things that are Caesar's, and to <S%G2316>God<s%> the things that are God's."

And they were <S%G3756>unable<s%> <S%G2480><s%> to <S%G1949>catch<s%> Him in a <S%G4487>saying<s%> in the <S%G1727>presence<s%> of the <S%G2992>people;<s%> and <S%G2296>marveling<s%> at His <S%G612>answer,<s%> they <S%G4601>became<s%> <S%G4601>silent.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> there <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> (who <S%G483>say<s%> that there is <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%>),

and they <S%G1905>questioned<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%> for us that <S%G1437>if<s%> a man's <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G599>dies,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and he is <S%G815>childless,<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> should <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G1135>wife<s%> and <S%G1817>raise<s%> up <S%G4690>offspring<s%> to his <S%G80>brother.<s%>
<S%G3767>"Now<s%> there were <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G80>brothers;<s%> and the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> a <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G815>childless;<s%>
and the <S%G1208>second<s%>

and the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> her; and in the <S%G5615>same<s%> <S%G5615>way<s%> <S%G3588>all<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G599>died,<s%> <S%G2641>leaving<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5043>children.<s%>
<S%G5306>"Finally<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>
"In the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> one's <S%G1135>wife<s%> will she be? For <S%G3588>all<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> her as <S%G1135>wife.<s%>"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "The <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G165>age<s%> <S%G1060>marry<s%> and are <S%G1061>given<s%> in <S%G1061>marriage,<s%>

but <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2661>considered<s%> <S%G2661>worthy<s%> to <S%G5177>attain<s%> to that <S%G165>age<s%> and the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1060>marry,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> are <S%G7031>given<s%> in <S%G7031>marriage;<s%>

for <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> they <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G2089>anymore,<s%> for they are <S%G2465>like<s%> <S%G2465>angels,<s%> and are <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1510>being<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of the <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

"But that the <S%G3498>dead<s%> are <S%G1453>raised,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3377>showed,<s%> in the [passage about the burning] <S%G942>bush,<s%> <S%G5613>where<s%> he <S%G3004>calls<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2384>Jacob.<s%>
<S%G1161>"Now<s%> He is not the <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> but of the <S%G2198>living;<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> to Him."
And <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> You have <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G2573>well.<s%>"
For they did not <S%G5111>have<s%> <S%G5111>courage<s%> to <S%G1905>question<s%> Him <S%G3765>any<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> about <S%G3762>anything.<s%>
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4459>"How<s%> [is it that] they <S%G3004>say<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is David's <S%G5207>son<s%>?

"For <S%G7035>David<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> in the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G5568>Psalms,<s%> 'The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to my <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2521>"Sit<s%> at My <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand,<s%>
<S%G2193>Until<s%> I <S%G5087>make<s%> <S%G4771>Thine<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> a <S%G5286>footstool<s%> for Thy <S%G4228>feet.<s%>"'
<S%G7035>"David<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2564>calls<s%> Him <S%G2962>'Lord,<s%>' and <S%G4459>how<s%> is He his <S%G5207>son<s%>?"
And while <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G191>listening,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

<S%G4337>"Beware<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> who <S%G2309>like<s%> to <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G4043>around<s%> in <S%G4749>long<s%> <S%G4749>robes,<s%> and <S%G5368>love<s%> respectful <S%G783>greetings<s%> in the <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G58>places,<s%> and <S%G4410>chief<s%> <S%G4410>seats<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and <S%G4411>places<s%> of <S%G4411>honor<s%> at <S%G1173>banquets,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2719>devour<s%> widows' <S%G3614>houses,<s%> and for appearance's <S%G4392>sake<s%> <S%G4336>offer<s%> <S%G3117>long<s%> <S%G4336>prayers;<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> will <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4053>greater<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation.<s%> "
